content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
- Boiler at Position (-46.5, -119.0) with pipes connecting positions (-48.5, -120.5), (-46.5, -120.5), (-44.5, -120.5), (-45.5, -120.5), (-48.5, -118.5), (-48.5, -119.5)
- Steam Engine at Position (-40.5, -113.5) with pipes connecting positions (-40.5, -116.5), (-39.5, -116.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (9.0, -64.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (9.0, -64.0) with coal and iron ore inventory

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage at Position (-15.0, -76.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -76.0)
- Wooden Chest at Position (-15.5, -77.5) for storage

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position (-19.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0) with copper plate inventory

### Inserter and Storage System at Position (6.5, -60.5)
Consists of:
- Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5) connected to small electric poles and wooden chests
- Wooden Chest at Position (6.5, -59.5) with iron and copper plate inventory
- Wooden Chest at Position (7.5, -61.5)

### Research Lab at Position (6.5, -60.5)
Consists of:
- Lab with automation science pack input, not receiving power

### Pipe Networks
- Multiple Pipe Groups connecting various positions, some full and others empty

### Electricity Network
- Small Electric Poles connecting various positions, currently not supplying power

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Inserting Items into a Furnace with Different Contents
- Ensure the furnace is empty or contains the same type of ore before inserting new items to avoid conflicts.

### Errors when Using Structures Without Fuel or Power
- Regularly check fuel levels in mining drills and furnaces to ensure continuous operation.
- Ensure all electrical entities are connected to a power network and receiving electricity.

### Errors with Full Storage
- Regularly empty chests to prevent mining drills from stopping due to full storage.

### Errors with Unconnected or Empty Fluid Systems
- Ensure all fluid systems are properly connected and filled to maintain operational status of boilers and steam engines.
